data.text:
[sibling(s) unknown]

Descendants

Profile last modified 29 Mar 2023 | Created 9 Nov 2011

This page has been accessed 2,128 times.

Contents

1.1 1568 Birth and Parents

2 Sources

Biography

This profile is part of the Hall Name Study.

1568 Birth and Parents

John Hall was born in England on October 12, 1568.[1]

John, son of John, was baptised on 12 October 1568 in Bishops Tawton, Devon, England.[2]

He was the brother of Richard HALL 1570-1648.[3]

John Hall (1568-1630) was the son of John Wyllyam Hall (1540-1610) and Christen Harding (1540- ) and the grandson of William John HALL (1517-1560) and Mary Stuerte (1513-1540).[3]

Marriage

He was the husband of Sisly "Sisley" Manfilde.[1]

He married Sisley Hall.[3]

On 23 September 1594, in Woodbury, Devon, England, he married Sisley HALL 1574-1645.[3]

23 September 1594: Marriage (with Sisley HALL) - Woodbury, Devon, England.[3]

1630 Death

John Hall died in 1630 in Withycombe Raleigh, Exmouth, Devon, England.[1]

He was deceased in 1630 - Withicomb Rawleigh, Devon, England.[3]

He died 1630 in Withicomb Rawleigh, Devon, England.[4]

He was buried in Withicomb Rawleigh, Devonshire, England.[4]

Children

He was the father of

George Robert Hall[1]

They had a child George Hall 1603-1669.[3]

Sources
